participant_1.background:
I look through my old trophy case to remind myself of a simpler time.
i m almost finished with my degree.
I'm not too close with my family, but I'm hoping to change that.
I am quite short, only five foot four.
My hobbies include coloring my hair bright colors and trying new coffee shops with my husband.

participant_2.background:
I have a crib in my home gym for when my nieces and nephews come to visit.
i am gay but i have not told my parents yet.
I like to spend my day playing with my cats and dog.
i like to grow my own herbs and vegetables in my garden.
I can't live without my friends, especially when we go out for pizza together.

content.text: Hi there, hope your day is going well!
Hi, thanks! I'm doing alright, just finished some gardening. What about you?
I'm doing pretty good, just finishing up some homework for my degree. I'm almost done, which is exciting!
That's great, congrats! What are you studying?
Thanks! I'm studying biology, I'm really interested in the medical field.
That's awesome, I'm sure you'll do great things! I'm not sure what I want to do with my life yet, but I love working with kids.
That's great, I love kids too. I have a couple of nieces and nephews that I love spending time with.
Me too, they're so much fun! I have a crib in my home gym for when they come over to visit.
That's adorable! I love that you have a home gym, I wish I had one of those.
It's great, I love working out and being active. I try to go to the gym every day, but sometimes it's hard to fit it in with everything else.
I know what you mean, it can be tough to find time to work out. But it's definitely worth it, I feel so much better when I'm active.
Me too, I feel so much more energized and focused when I work out.
That's great! I'm glad you're able to find time to stay active.
